data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: The Trading Window for dealing in securities of the company (Ganesh Consumer Products Limited) by Designated persons and their immediate relatives is closed with effect from 01-01-2026 till the end of 48 hours after the declaration of Financial Results of the company for the quarter ending on 31-12-2025.

data.caption: Intimation Of Extraordinary General Meeting
data.news_body: The Extraordinary General Meeting of the Shareholders of Ganesh Consumer Products Limited is scheduled on Friday 16th day of January 2026 at 1:00 PM (IST) through video conferencing ("VC")/ Other Audio Visual Means ("OAVM"). Copy of Notice of EGM is attached herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Board has inter-alia considered and approved the following subject to the approval of the shareholders in the ensuing Extra-Ordinary General Meeting:
1. Approval of Ganesh Consumer Products Limited - Employee Stock Option Scheme 2025
2. Approval for Secondary Acquisition of Shares Through Trust Route for the Implementation Of Ganesh Consumer Products Limited - Employee Stock Option Scheme 2025
3. Approval for Provision of Money by the Company for Purchase of its own Shares by Ganesh Employee Welfare Trust Under The Ganesh Consumer Products Limited - Employee Stock Option Scheme 2025

data.caption: Submission Of Employee Welfare Trust Deed
data.news_body: Employee Welfare Trust set-up to implement and administer the welfare scheme inter-alia an equity-based employee compensation plan for the benefit of the employees.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for To Consider And Approve Ganesh Consumer Products Limited - Employee Stock Option Scheme 2025
data.news_body: Ganesh Consumer Products Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 20/12/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Approval of  Ganesh Consumer Products Limited -Employee Stock Option Scheme 2025

data.caption: Intimation For Change Of Corporate Identification Number (CIN) From U15311WB2000PLC091315 To L15311WB2000PLC091315 And The Listing Status Of The Company On The Master Data Of The Ministry Of Corporate Affairs Has Been Changed From No To Yes.
data.news_body: Pursuant to listing of the Company and in furtherance to our application made to Registrar of Companies West Bengal the CIN of the Company has been changed thereby making the effect of the same and Listing Status of the Company also changed from "No" to "Yes" on the Master Data of Ministry of Corporate Affairs Website.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Ganesh Consumer Products Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 06/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve 1. The Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Half Year ended 30th September 2025.

2. The Declaration of Interim Dividend for the Financial Year   2025-26

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Meeting Intimation For Considering And Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results For Quarter Ended 30Th June 2025
data.news_body: Ganesh Consumer Products Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 16/10/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Prior Intimation of Board Meeting Schedule on 16th day of October 2025 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter Ended 30th June2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Further to our earlier communication the Trading Window will also remain closed for Quarter ending on 30th June 2025

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Please be informed that pursuant to the code of conduct for Prohibition of Insider Trading in dealing with the Securities of Ganesh Consumer Products Limited (Company) read with applicable provisions of the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations as amended the trading window for dealing in securities of the company by designated persons and their immediate relatives is closed with effect from 01st October 2025 till the end of 48 hours after declaration of the Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter ending on 30th September 2025

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Ganesh Consumer Products Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 29 2025 the equity shares of Ganesh Consumer Products Ltd (Scrip Code: 544528) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250926-68 dated September 26 2025.
